00044 template< typename T, sc_writer_policy POL = SC_DEFAULT_WRITER_POLICY >
00045 class sc_buffer
00046 : public sc_signal<T,POL>
00047 {
00048 public:
00049 
00050     // typedefs
00051 
00052     typedef sc_buffer<T,POL> this_type;
00053     typedef sc_signal<T,POL> base_type;
00054     typedef T                value_type;
00055 
00056 public:
00057 
00058     // constructors
00059 
00060     sc_buffer()
00061         : base_type( sc_gen_unique_name( "buffer" ) )
00062         {}
00063 
00064     explicit sc_buffer( const char* name_ )
00065         : base_type( name_ )
00066         {}
00067 
00068     sc_buffer( const char* name_, const value_type& initial_value_ )
00069       : base_type( name_, initial_value_ )
00070     {}
00071 
00072     // interface methods
00073 
00074     // write the new value
00075     virtual void write( const T& );
00076 
00077 
00078     // other methods
00079 
00080     virtual const char* kind() const
00081         { return "sc_buffer"; }
00082 
00083 
00084     // assignment
00085     this_type& operator = ( const value_type& a )
00086       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00087 
00088     this_type& operator = ( const sc_signal_in_if<value_type>& a )
00089       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00090 
00091     this_type& operator = ( const this_type& a )
00092       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00093 
00094 protected:
00095 
00096     virtual void update();
00097 
00098 private:
00099 
00100     // disabled
00101     sc_buffer( const this_type& );
00102 };

00105 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00106 
00107 // write the new value
00108 
00109 template< typename T, sc_writer_policy POL >
00110 inline
00111 void
00112 sc_buffer<T,POL>::write( const T& value_ )
00113 {
00114     if( !base_type::policy_type::check_write(this,true) )
00115       return;
00116 
00117     this->m_new_val = value_;
00118     this->request_update();
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 template< typename T, sc_writer_policy POL >
00123 inline
00124 void
00125 sc_buffer<T,POL>::update()
00126 {
00127     base_type::policy_type::update();
00128     base_type::do_update();
00129 }
